Author: 1KCoin
Title: ‚ù§Ô∏è[Dividends][Ico]1KCoin--CryptoBenefits in a Private Club of Investors ‚ù§Ô∏è
Body: Dear 1KCoin Community ‚ù§Ô∏è  We are happy to announce that the BOUNTY program has reached it`s goal!  BOUNTY was available for the first 1 000 registered members who helped us spread the news about 1KCoin Project on social media, and we are enthusiastic to see the positive response into our community.  We thank you all for you contribution!    We still have the Referral and Airdrop Programs remaining:   1. For AIRDROP: - Between 0.1 and 10 1Kcoin tokens will be distributed to wallet addresses on Waves platform:  a. You have to have min. 100 Waves coin in your wallet on Waves platform, and you will receive min. 0.1 tokens. b. If you have more than 10.000 Waves coins, you will receive 10 1KCoin tokens.  AIRDROP is available for 15.000 1KCoin tokens. The wallet addresses chosen for airdrop are solely at the 1KCoin discretion. If you want to have a chance at Airdrop directly, register on https://www.1kcoin.io/ and submit your personal Waves wallet. (you still need to have at least 100 waves tokens to qualify)   2. For REFERRAL: - 10% for referrals  It is simple: register on https://www.1kcoin.io/ and you will receive a unique reference link, then you can invite your friends to buy tokens, you can tell them about 1KCoin project and to analyze the Whitepaper, and you will receive 10% on each acquisition in the ICO phase through your referral link, for the amount paid.

Author: 1KCoin
Title: ‚ù§Ô∏è[Dividends][Ico]1KCoin--CryptoBenefits in a Private Club of Investors ‚ù§Ô∏è
Body: Thank you very much, dear Sir, your feedback is most welcome. (is also a good feedback, so...  )  We worked restlessly to have the project stated, but we are happy that we got our feet moving. We truly have the desire to make it work, we are Not a Ponzi, definitely Not a scam...  The first idea was to gather some friends (we thought first about 100) in a "Club of Investors" and to make investments in different projects, because we have the members with the necessary background for this. And to become financially comfortable as to go together in travels, more or less "expensive", but to have the time and means for our group to do so. Then we thought about making the community a global one, so the idea of the ICO emerged. And right now we are looking with great pleasure that we have members joining us from all over the world. We are based in Spain, but we were just talking with someone from Australia that will come to Europe this year, so we will Definitely meet and have a drink together.

Body: Thank you and welcome. Yes, we believe also in having an easy way to convert from crypto to fiat and vice-versa. One of our main goals is to focus on implementing a prepaid crypto-card in order to help our community to have access to easy liquidity and exchange from crypto to fiat money. Lack of flexibility between crypto-coins and fiat is becoming one of the growing and urgent problems of crypto-domain, and limits the widespread adoption of virtual money.

Author: 1KCoin
Title: ‚ù§Ô∏è[Dividends][Ico]1KCoin--CryptoBenefits in a Private Club of Investors ‚ù§Ô∏è
Body: Home   Whitepaper   Why 1KCoin?    Roadmap    FAQ    Ambassador    Airdrop/Bounty    1K-Team    Sign Up    Login    1KCoin, the token you don't want to sell after ICO   1KCoin is a private club of investors, with the goal of bringing friends together in a community that benefits from the experience of professional traders, but without the hassle of managing a diversified portfolio on different exchange platforms for crypto-coins, and also without the risks inherent in the lack of crypto-knowledge.  You can be part of a community that builds an ecosystem of projects, both in crypto AND in classical businesses. Experienced traders will manage the crypto-funds, but also the 1KCoin financial ecosystem will include classical projects voted by the community, and those who get the majority of votes will be funded. Monthly earnings from all projects where community money was invested will be shared back into the community as dividends.      1KCoin is a token created using the Waves platform. 1K-Team has designed a simple and transparent system (1K-WO) for the sustainability of our project:  1. Exchange and decentralized wallet on Waves platform, each shareholder has control of their 1KCoin tokens, being able to make withdrawals and / or new purchases of their choice at any time.  2. All tokens will be put into circulation once the ICO phase has been completed.  3. It will not be possible to create new coins, in order not to alter the 1KCoin ecosystem. The supply is limited to 12 million tokens. No additional tokens will ever be issued.  4. To encourage usability, the dividends will be distributed back to community, in wallets on Waves platform having min. 100 1KCoin tokens in each trade cycle, in 1KCoin tokens previously purchased in crypto-exchanges by 1K-Team, at the current value. This practice supports supply / demand, sustainability and price growth.     ROADMAP       REFERRAL     2. For REFERRAL: - 10% for referrals  It is simple: register on https://www.1kcoin.io/ and you will receive a unique reference link, then you can invite your friends to buy tokens, you can tell them about 1KCoin project and to analyze the Whitepaper, and you will receive 10% on each acquisition in the ICO phase through your referral link, for the amount paid.   1KCoin is a real company, with a desire to build a real ecosystem of projects. Come have a friendly chat with us in Madrid, Barcelona or meet us at our events. Bring your expertise, your knowledge and your desire for a better future and let`s build our community with transparency and dedication. Together we are stronger than on our own.
